item.summary: Exception, when add attribute with same name
item.description: When you try to add attribute into element and this element contains attribute with same name, then exception should be thrown.
When you try to set doctype into document, which already contains doctype, then exception should be thrown.

item.summary: Exception, when try replace root element
item.description: When you try to set element into document, which already contains element, then exception should be thrown.
Create UML Model of TAX to better understanding TAX design.
Create MOF Model of TAX to support prepared MDR module and next generation of data modules.

item.summary: ParserLoader should be moved from core module to tax module.
item.description: Class org.netbeans.modules.xml.core.tree.ParserLoader should be moved from to tax module.
